sense.def:
A volume
je eden izmed več delov v nizu knjig.

seg.quote: It was published in three volumes.

sense.def:
The volume of something
je prostor, ki ga nekaj vsebuje ali zaseda.

seg.quote: The gas expanded to nine times its original volume.

sense.def:
The volume of something
je tudi količina tistega, kar obstaja.

seg.quote: The volume of work is incredible.

sense.def:
The volume of a radio, TV, or record player
je glasnost radijskega ali televizijskega sprejemnika ali videorekorderja.

seg.quote: Black Flag play rock music at excruciatingly high volume.
